inclusion.criterion: Invasive recurrence (ductal, lobular, other), homolateral breast carcinoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Size of the tumor with ultrasound ≤ 5cm
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Procedure for the detection of lymph node sentinel by isotopic method +/- colorimetric
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Minimum delay of one year between the end of radiotherapy for initial breast carcinoma and the treatment / management of ipsilateral recurrence
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Pregnancy test (urinary or blood) negative for premenopausal patients
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Information of the patient and obtaining written consent, signed by the patient and the investigator
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Invasive recurrence (ductal, lobular, other), homolateral breast carcinoma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Size of the tumor with ultrasound ≤ 5cm
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Allergy known to 2 detection products (Blue and radioactive tracer)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient is a 42 year-old postmenopausal woman with a history of breast cancer and lymph node involvement. She has undergone lumpectomy and radiotherapy, and is now seeking treatment for ipsilateral recurrence.
